DOC.brief_summary: To investigate metabolic and molecular response to fatty acid-specific overfeeding in overweight subjects, in relation to changes in ectopic fat, lean tissue mass and insulin sensitivity
DOC.brief_title: Overeating Different Fats and Influence on Muscle Mass and Body Fat Accumulation
DOC.criteria: Body mass index 2532 Type 2 diabetes Type 1 diabetes Kidney disease Liver disease Abnormal clinical chemistry at screening Intense physical exercise > 2 hours per week Use of statins or drugs affecting energy metabolism Use of extreme diets
